definitions.definition: a person whose job is presenting or talking on television or radio programmes

examples.text: She is a writer and broadcaster on environmental matters.

definitions.definition: a company that sends out television or radio programmes

examples.text: The country needs a national public service broadcaster like the BBC.
Existing commercial broadcasters claim the new stations are illegal.
The footage was aired by local broadcasters.
The chief executive will leave the state-owned broadcaster next February.
